message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. I believe it will greatly enhance your operations and efficiency. Considering its value to you, I am offering it for $9500. This price reflects the high quality and the significant benefits it will bring to your business.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $8500 for the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and I'd like to make a proposal that might work for both of us. Considering the value of the product to your business, I am willing to offer the product for $9000. This price still reflects the quality and benefits it brings, while remaining competitive with your budget.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $8750 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget while still acknowledging the value of your product.

I appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer the product for $8875. This price reflects the high quality and value it provides to your business, while remaining competitive with your budget constraints.
Hello Alice, I'm glad we're able to continue discussing this. I would like to propose a price of $8800 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your offer while staying within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. Considering the quality and value of the product, I am willing to sell it to you for $8750. This price strikes a balance between reflecting the product's value and accommodating your budget.
